attributes.action: Representation at the Cenotaph for those of Non-Faith
attributes.additional_details:
With more than 26,000 service personnel with no faith it is unfair that their is no representation by either the British Humanist Association or United Kingdom Armed Forces Humanist Association.

 I call upon the Secretary of Culture to allow representation at the Cenotaph Remembrance Day service in London by UKAFHA and BHA.
